message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than that price might initially suggest.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't let it go for less than $13,500. It's truly a fantastic product and I'm confident you'd benefit greatly from it.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your position, but I am still not able to meet at $13,500. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
